sentences.chinese: 我膽怯着走到集市中間。

sentences.english: But today, kind of at that end is a great big high-rise office block.

sentences.english: Tuesday be market day so the street be closed to traffic.
sentences.chinese: 星期二是集市日，因此大街上禁止車輛通行。

sentences.english: It used to be a market.

sentences.chinese: 我跟着她離開了鄉村集市。
